Class playn.core.Canvas

Added interface react.Closeable.

Changed from an interface to a class.

Removed Methods
Canvas drawImage(Image, float, float) Draws an image at the specified location.
Canvas drawImage(Image, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled image at the specified location.
Canvas drawImage(Image, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled subset of an image at the specified location.
Canvas drawImageCentered(Image, float, float) Draws an image, centered at the specified location.
float height() The height of this canvas.
float width() The width of this canvas.
 

Added Methods
void close() Informs the platform that this canvas, and its backing image will no longer be used.
Gradient createGradient(Config) Creates a gradient fill pattern.
Canvas draw(Drawable, float, float) Draws {@code image} at the specified location {@code (x, y)}.
Canvas draw(Drawable, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled image at the specified location {@code (x, y)} size {@code (w x h)}.
Canvas draw(Drawable, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) Draws a subregion of a image {@code (sw x sh) @ (sx, sy)} at the specified size {@code (dw x dh)} and location {@code (dx, dy)}.
Canvas drawCentered(Drawable, float, float) Draws {@code image} centered at the specified location.
Image snapshot() Returns an immutable snapshot of the image that backs this canvas.
Texture toTexture() Calls .toTexture(Texture.Config) with the default texture config.
Texture toTexture(Config) A helper function for creating a texture from this canvas's image, and then disposing this canvas.
 

Added Fields
float height The height of this canvas.
Image image The image that underlies this canvas.
float width The width of this canvas.
